name: Sarah Ahmed
review: This resume builder is a game-changer! The templates are clean, professional, and easy to customize. I landed 3 interviews within a week of using it.

name: Jamal Uddin
review: I loved how simple the tool was to use. The AI suggestions really helped improve my resume for ATS systems. Highly recommended for freshers!

name: Amina Rahman
review: The portfolio integration is perfect for showcasing my work. Recruiters complimented how visually impressive my resume looked.
